title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7308.5 - Contact visits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7308.5 - Contact visits

State Regulations
(a) Consistent
with subdivision (b) of this section, physical contact shall be permitted
between a youth and his or her visitors. (b) Youth and their visitors shall be
required to conduct themselves in an appropriate manner and consistent with
reasonable standards of public decency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7308.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
